Description: Payment Processing System Migration - Complete infrastructure with VPC, RDS MySQL Multi-AZ, DMS, ALB, Auto Scaling, and monitoring

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Unique suffix for resource naming to enable multiple deployments
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

PublicSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ1

PublicSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ2

PublicSubnet3CIDR.Description: CIDR block for public subnet in AZ3

PrivateSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ1

PrivateSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ2

PrivateSubnet3CIDR.Description: CIDR block for private subnet in AZ3

DBUsername.Description: Master username for RDS MySQL database

DBInstanceClass.Description: RDS instance class for MySQL database

DBAllocatedStorage.Description: Allocated storage for RDS instance in GB

OnPremisesDBHost.Description: Hostname or IP address of on-premises MySQL database

OnPremisesDBPort.Description: Port number of on-premises MySQL database

EC2InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for application servers

AlarmEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer - allows HTTPS traffic from internet

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow HTTP traffic from internet (redirect to HTTPS)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for application servers - allows traffic only from ALB

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow traffic from ALB on application port

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for RDS MySQL - allows MySQL traffic only from application servers and DMS

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow MySQL traffic from application servers
Allow MySQL traffic from DMS replication instance

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for DMS replication instance - allows access to source and target databases

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow MySQL traffic to on-premises and RDS

Description.Fn::Sub: KMS key for RDS MySQL encryption - ${EnvironmentSuffix}

Statement.Sid: Allow RDS to use the key

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet group for RDS MySQL across 3 AZs

Properties.ReplicationSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet group for DMS replication instance

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y amazon-cloudwatch-agent

# Install application dependencies
yum install -y java-11-amazon-corretto

# Configure CloudWatch agent
/opt/aws/amazon-cloudwatch-agent/bin/amazon-cloudwatch-agent-ctl \
  -a fetch-config \
  -m ec2 \
  -s \
  -c default

# Application will be deployed separately
echo "Instance provisioned for payment processing application"

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when RDS CPU utilization exceeds 80%
Alarm when RDS free storage space is below 10GB

VPCId.Description: VPC ID for payment processing infrastructure

DBSecretArn.Description: ARN of Secrets Manager secret containing database password

ALBDNSName.Description: DNS name of Application Load Balancer

AppServerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for application servers

SNSTopicArn.Description: ARN of SNS topic for CloudWatch alarms

KMSKeyId.Description: KMS Key ID for RDS encryption
